display_long_description:
[media]
Welcome to Ancient Dungeon VR. This is a fast and fun dungeon roguelite game made just for VR. Swing your sword, grab loot, and explore rooms full of traps, secrets, and monsters. The dungeons change every time you play! It’s one of the best-rated VR games out there with Overwhelmingly Positive reviews, and you can play for many hours with your friends!

[media]
**Full Online Multiplayer**

Trade blows with dungeon bosses, share loot, and revive each other… or let them get caught while you grab the loot. Your choice. Multiplayer supports up to 4 players.
[media]
**New Dungeons Every Time**

No two runs are the same! Every time you play, the dungeon looks different, with new monsters and loot. You can unlock secret rooms, new floors, and cool surprises.
[media]
**Real Combat. Real Movement. Real Fun.**

Slash, block, throw, and dodge, all with your real hands in VR! You can even cut down plants if you’re feeling silly. 
[media]
**Unique  Powerups, Countless Builds**

Find special items called Relics that make you stronger or give you new powers. Will you become a glass cannon? A tanky swordsman? Or maybe something... cursed?
[media]
**Permanent Unlocks & Upgrades**

Earn permanent rewards like new weapons, floors, relics, upgrades, hard mode, and more! Every adventure helps you build power and unlock fresh challenges.


Join the discord: https://discord.gg/advr
[media]
